summary: Coney Island's beaches and rides reopened on Friday having been repaired and even spiffed up after superstorm Sandy. Now a 360-unit former affordable-housing complex will likewise get major upgrade.

summary: If Barcelona's recent history of big-money overseas signings is any judge, Neymar is likely to be a colossal waste of money.

summary: Sock, a thoroughly American tennis talent, fits right in at the French Open, where he won for the first time in his career Tuesday.

summary: Thank you to Russell Ryan for saying what so many of us familiar with the ways of the Securities and Exchange Commission have been thinking ("Why the SEC Needs 'No-Admit' Settlements," op-ed, May 22).
